title: User login success with valid credentials
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in using a valid email and password combination and the session is persisted.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid email and password
Click the login button
Verify the user is logged in and redirected to the dashboard
Refresh the page and confirm session is persisted

title: User login fails with invalid credentials
description: Ensure the system prevents login with incorrect email or password and displays an appropriate error message.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter invalid email or password
Click the login button
Verify login is rejected and error message is shown

title: Dashboard renders all three zones correctly
description: Validate that the dashboard loads Now, Today, and Context zones with dynamic widgets displaying current data and interactions.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the dashboard
Check that Now zone is visible with relevant widgets
Check that Today zone is visible with tasks and habits
Check that Context zone is visible with user context info
Interact with widgets such as habit completions and task updates
Verify UI updates reflect interactions

title: Create, edit, complete, and delete habit with real-time UI updates
description: Test the full lifecycle of a habit including creation, editing fields, marking as complete with optimistic UI, and deleting a habit.

steps.description: Navigate to habit management section
Create a new habit with valid fields
Verify the new habit appears instantly in the habit list and dashboard widgets
Edit the habit's name and parameters
Verify habit updates appear in UI immediately
Mark the habit as completed for the current day
Confirm completion is reflected with visual feedback and updated streak counts
Delete the habit
Verify the habit is removed from all displays immediately

title: View habit heatmap and analytics
description: Ensure habit heatmaps and streak analytics display accurately according to logged habit data.

steps.description: Navigate to habit analytics page
Confirm heatmap visualization displays correct frequency and dates
Verify streak counters match logged habit completions

title: Create, update, delete and reorder tasks with Kanban drag-and-drop
description: Validate task lifecycle on the Kanban board including creation, editing, status updates via drag-and-drop, and deletion.

steps.description: Open task management Kanban board
Create a new task with name, description, and status
Check new task appears in correct status column
Edit task details
Verify updated task fields display immediately
Drag and drop task to a different status column
Confirm task status is updated and UI reflects new ordering
Delete the task
Verify task is removed from Kanban board

title: Quick Capture task creation with AI parsing
description: Test the Quick Capture input for creating tasks using natural language and AI parsing to generate tasks.

steps.description: Access Quick Capture input in dashboard
Enter a natural language string describing a task
Submit Quick Capture input
Verify AI parsing creates a task with correct details and places it in the Kanban board

title: Add financial transaction with AI category suggestion and accurate summaries
description: Validate financial transaction entry supports AI category suggestions and updates transaction table and financial summaries correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to financial management section
Add a new transaction with amount, date, and description
Verify AI suggests appropriate category for the transaction
Accept AI category suggestion and save transaction
Confirm transaction appears in the transaction table immediately
Check financial charts and summaries reflect the new transaction accurately

title: View and manage university courses, assignments, and grades
description: Test adding, updating, and deleting courses and assignments; verify correct grade calculations and What-If simulator accuracy.

steps.description: Navigate to university module
Add a new course with required details
Confirm course appears in course list and dashboard
Add assignments to the course with due dates and weights
Verify assignments display correctly on assignment tracker Kanban board
Enter grades for assignments
Confirm grade calculator updates course grade accurately
Use What-If simulator to change hypothetical grades
Verify simulator outputs correctly predict course grade outcomes
Edit and delete courses and assignments
Check UI updates reflect changes immediately

title: AI Assistant responds accurately and offers task creation suggestions
description: Test AI chat interface interaction including posing questions, receiving accurate answers, and AI suggesting task creation with user confirmation.

steps.description: Open AI Assistant chat via floating action button
Send a query related to user data insights or task creation
Verify AI responds accurately and contextually to the query
Confirm AI suggests task creation when applicable
Accept AI's suggested task creation
Verify the suggested task is created and appears in task management

title: Create, edit, and display journal entries with mood tracking
description: Validate journaling functionality including creation and editing of entries, saving mood states, and correct display of entries.

steps.description: Navigate to journaling section
Create a new journal entry with text and select mood
Verify entry is saved and displayed in journal list
Edit the journal entry text and mood
Confirm updates are saved and reflected correctly

title: Gamification points, levels, streaks, and badges update correctly
description: Ensure gamification system updates user points, levels, streaks, and awards badges appropriately based on user actions.

steps.description: Perform actions that earn points such as completing tasks and habits
Verify points and streak counters update in real-time
Check level progress bar increments correctly
Achieve criteria for earning badges
Confirm badges are awarded and displayed

title: Focus Mode timer starts, pauses, and resets correctly
description: Test the Focus Mode functionality including starting the timer, pausing it, and resetting to ensure distraction-free environment.

steps.description: Activate Focus Mode to start timer
Verify countdown timer starts accurately
Pause the timer
Confirm timer pauses and retains remaining time
Reset the timer
Verify timer resets to initial duration

title: Responsive UI adjusts correctly on mobile, tablet, and desktop
description: Verify that the UI layout and components adapt correctly to different screen sizes and device breakpoints per design specifications.

steps.description: Open the application on desktop screen size
Check that all dashboard zones and widgets are fully visible and arranged properly
Resize viewport to tablet dimensions
Verify layout adjusts with accessible navigation and readable content
Resize viewport to mobile screen size
Confirm UI components stack or adapt for usability and no content overflows

title: Accessibility compliance with WCAG 2.1 Level AA
description: Test application pages and components for compliance with WCAG 2.1 AA guidelines including keyboard navigation, color contrast, and screen reader support.

steps.description: Navigate through the app using only keyboard navigation
Confirm that focus states are visible and logical across all interactive elements
Use a screen reader to explore main sections including dashboard, habits, tasks, and finances
Verify all content is read out properly with semantic markup
Check all text and UI elements meet color contrast standards
Confirm contrast ratios meet WCAG 2.1 Level AA thresholds

title: Performance - UI responsiveness under typical user actions
description: Measure and verify UI responsiveness when updating habits, tasks, financial data, and AI chat interactions meet performance targets.

steps.description: Perform rapid habit completion and creation actions
Confirm UI updates occur within acceptable latency (<200ms)
Drag and drop multiple tasks on Kanban board consecutively
Validate smooth UI animation and no freezing
Input multiple financial transactions rapidly with AI suggestions
Verify transaction table and summaries refresh promptly
Send queries to AI Assistant chat
Ensure AI responses are returned with minimal delay per performance criteria

title: Error handling when API requests fail for critical features
description: Test application behavior and user feedback when API requests fail during habit, task, finance, and university module operations.

steps.description: Simulate API failure on creating a habit
Verify user is shown a descriptive error message and optimistic UI is reverted
Simulate API failure on task drag-and-drop update
Confirm error notification appears and task position resets correctly
Simulate API failure when adding a financial transaction
Check proper error feedback is displayed and transaction is not added
Simulate API failure during grade input in university module
Ensure user receives clear error and data remains consistent
